# harness_platform_ip_allowlist (Resource)

Resource for managing IP allowlist configs.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "harness_platform_ip_allowlist" "example" {
  identifier = "identifier"
  name       = "name"
  ip_address = "0.0.0.0/0"

  allowed_source_type = ["API"]
  enabled             = true

  description = "allowlist example"
  tags        = ["foo:bar"]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `identifier` (String) Unique identifier of the resource.
- `ip_address` (String) CIDR range or IP address to allow.
- `name` (String) Name of the resource.

### Optional

- `allowed_source_type` (Set of String) List of sources to allow. Valid values are `UI` and `API`.
- `description` (String) Description of the resource.
- `enabled` (Boolean) Whether the allowlist config is enabled.
- `tags` (Set of String) Tags to associate with the resource.

### Read-Only

- `created` (Number) Creation timestamp for the config.
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `updated` (Number) Last update timestamp for the config.
